verbs.description: [V: According] to CNN , Michael Cohen is willing to give up information on Trump for the right deal .
[ARGM-ADV: According to CNN] , [ARG1: Michael Cohen] [V: is] [ARG2: willing to give up information on Trump for the right deal] .
According to CNN , [ARG0: Michael Cohen] is willing to [V: give] up [ARG1: information on Trump] [ARGM-PRP: for the right deal] .
